review_body: It's really cute, but should be worn delicately, meaning not all the time.  It's a thin sliver band and can bend easily, so it may snag and pull apart. If you are a coffee fan and love cute dainty rings, this is for you! If you get it and don't like it, it can be returned within 30 days, so it's a no risk purchase.  It comes in a cute little gift box and would be great as a stocking stuffer.  I received a ring at a special price for my honest review.

product_title: Coffee Lover Gift - Simple & Unique 925 Sterling Silver Coffee Ring Jewelry for Women
review_headline: Beautiful Ring for Coffee Lovers Everywhere!
review_body:
I'm a huge coffee addict and love the stuff any way I can get it. Daniel Doughty's sterling silver coffee cup ring is a beautiful way for me to show off my obsession!

My fingers will react to cheap metal, so I try to watch what I'm wearing. This beautiful ring is made of 925 sterling silver and hasn't caused my skin to react at all. The silver finish is very bright and the sterling silver is strong enough to resist bending or warping through the day. The thin band takes up very little space on my finger and is comfortable enough to wear all day!

Of course I purchased this ring for its design moreso than its function. The tiny coffee cup and steam lines resemble the iconic image for coffee that every brew junkie is familiar with. The cup and detailed lines are separated completely and there's a break in the ring in between them. The cup is wider than the band of the ring but not so much that it becomes a hassle.

Daniel Doughty's coffee ring is a gorgeous way to show my love for coffee! I did receive this ring at a discount but price doesn't change how great it looks, nor does it effect my review.

product_title: Coffee Lover Gift - Simple & Unique 925 Sterling Silver Coffee Ring Jewelry for Women
review_body: This is an adorable little ring to let everyone know how much you love your coffee!  Because of the separation between the mug and the steam, it will give enough for me to wear it on any of my fingers, not just the ring finger I ordered it in the size of. That's cool.  It is sturdy and very well made and of a higher quality than rings I've purchased at a department store in the past.  The steam part does stick out a little and it might snag on things, so I'm saving this pretty ring for date night or going out to the coffee shop with my mom friends.  It's just too nice to wear on laundry day!!  It is dainty, the cup not much wider than my finger.  It's a sweet little ring that shows that you have a quirky side and appreciate a cup of tea or a mug of coffee.  I'd definitely buy it for any barista or aspiring novelist or grad student.  I did receive a discount in exchange for this honest, unbiased review.  I would certainly buy this again for a friend.  I think it is very pretty.  : )

product_title: Coffee Lover Gift - Simple & Unique 925 Sterling Silver Coffee Ring Jewelry for Women
review_headline: GREAT ring for yourself or the PERFECT gift for a coffee (or tea) lover.
review_body:
I LOVE this ring! Well, I love coffee, so it just follows. But also, it's well made, has a classy look, and is made of sterling silver. There's no downside here.

First, it's adorable. Who wouldn't love this little homage to my favorite morning beverage? And, yes, it's a coffee ring, but I bet if you know someone who loves a nice cup of hot tea, she'd like this, too.

The ring functions a little like an adjustable ring, since it's open on the one side. I was a little hesitant about what size to order - so I erred on the large size, hoping it wouldn't matter. It turned out to be a perfect decision -- the ring slips easily over my knuckles, and then I can squeeze it down to a comfortable level of snugness.

It's also, well, just very nice looking, even thought it's fun. I would be completely comfortable wearing this to a business meeting. It's a piece of casual jewelry, but so well made I think it can work with many ensembles.

The "steam" does protrude a bit. I found it catching on various things until I got used to it.

I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest review. Any opinion expressed is mine alone.

product_title: Coffee Lover Gift - Simple & Unique 925 Sterling Silver Coffee Ring Jewelry for Women
review_body:
I love this coffee ring! It’s so cute and so “me;” I love coffee and silver jewelry! The ring fit nicely, true to size and since there is a gap between the top of the cup and the steam, it can be gently adjusted if necessary.
The one thing that keeps this from being an everyday ring for me is that gap between the cup and steam; it seems to keep getting caught on my hair. Cute for a few hours at a time, though :)

review_headline: The fabric quality is great. Not so heavy that a crinoline won't hold ...
review_body: My bust is 40 1/2  and the extra large measurement was 39 1/2 ( give or take). So I ordered a size up( XXL) even though reviews said it was stretchy, because I still wanted a modest, not too tight fit. Well, I could have ordered the XL, there is enough stretch in the fabric to give an inch or so without looking tight.  Since I ordered up, I'll just take it in at the zipper, no problem.  The fabric quality is great. Not so heavy that a crinoline won't hold it out but not flimsy either.  It's  true to color( i ordered the blue/violet and its a nice deep purple) I'm  5'4" and the Xxl hits me almost mid calf ( without petticoat)  shipping was fast and came two days before it was scheduled to.

product_title: Mountain Warehouse Glacier Extreme Womens Long Waterproof Jacket
review_body: After ordering pants from Mountain Warehouse which were a perfect fit and excellent quality, I was confident ordering a few other products from them. The package arrived in a few days but with the wrong items. Here's where the company shines. I emailed them that night and the next morning I received an email apologizing and assuring me the correct items were being sent immediately and they would reimburse return shipping costs. The items arrived the next day as well as confirmation of reimbursed shipping fee.  This jacket is actually a higher quality and craftsmanship than I expected. The fit is roomy which I need for layering. Details such as velcro closures along zipper and hood are well placed, two discrete inner pockets are perfect for phone, wallet, sunglasses, keys. I love the overall quality and the color is perfect. I look forward to future purchases from Mountain Warehouse.

product_title: Dream Girl Boy's 9939 1 PC Gone Mental Costumes
review_body: I am writing to share a serious matter of importance as it relates to one of your children’s costumes.  I refer to your Gone Mental children’s costume, with the description that reads, “He has crazy thoughts in his head¡­he¡¯s GONE MENTAL. This pullover tunic features faux vinyl straightjacket straps with buckles detailing, blood splatters, and mental ward screen print. You¡¯d be crazy not to get one!” My younger daughter, once an honor student, athlete and musician before her illness presented during the onset of adolescence, has lived with schizoaffective disorder for the past six years, and was hospitalized as a child.  We’ve taken her to UCLA and Stanford, as well as our local hospitals, hoping to make sense of her devastating illness.  If you have ever spent anytime visiting a loved one in a children’s/adolescent’s mental health treatment facility, I assure you, you would understand that this costume is painfully cruel. Childhood suffering is not an appropriate inspiration for a Halloween costume.  And neither is adulthood suffering (note that you sell several other adult costumes that stigmatize and inappropriately portray the mentally ill). Vampires are not real.  Mummies come-to-life, monsters and zombies are not real.  Cartoon characters, fairy princesses and action heroes are not real.  Those types of costumes are appropriate to sell for children for Halloween.  But childhood and adolescent mental illness very real.  I doubt you would sell a Stage Four Cancer costume.  Why would you sell a costume that makes fun of a severe brain disorder? Stigma only encourages hopelessness and despair.  Please reconsider stigmatizing our daughter’s very real illness by removing “Gone Mental” and other mental illness inspired costumes from your inventory.

product_title: Mission Belt Strap
review_headline: (live video test) Coolest belt ever. Fits like a glove
review_body:
[[VIDEOID:53b2db124969d55f8671f24e58b2352]] UPDATE: This takes a learning curve to get used to. The lever that releases the pin from the teeth require that you push it in a certain direction to release it. I thought my belt was stuck, but instead of forcing it, I simply inhaled a little (to take pressure off of the belt) and that allowed me to easily push the lever and release the belt. Note that you don't want a belt that releases *too* easily, which I have experienced especially with the Bowen knife belts. (those randomly pop off, which drives me crazy)

UPDATE x2: Dang I just saw the price on this. I'm blown away by Amazon. This is a very high quality leather belt for the price. I'm a cheap skate, and I can tell you my humble minions... this would cost twice at Nordstrom.

✏️ Quick thoughts to supplement my video demonstration.

I like this belt because:
- The nylon is nice because it's somewhat \\"floppy\\" and isn't stiff like conventional leather. Granted it has the military type look (rather than the nicely dressed look that you'd associate with a leather belt), but the nylon is extremely durable and heavy duty and doesn't scratch up like leather. Awesome military belt if you're looking for one to hang a 45 off of.
- Super customization. The little notches allow me to fit it perfectly around my waste, as opposed to conventional belts that have set holes, which can be upwards of two inches apart.
- Looks awesome. Cool seeing a belt with no holes.
- Easy to put on. Stays in place and doesn't slip.
- Easy to take off, once you get the hang of it (see update above). Note: Do NOT force it! It'll just dig the \\"teeth\\" MORE into the mechanism, and you'll be stuck. Just take your time, and it'll come right off.
- True to sizing. Don't try to go \\"a size up\\" or \\"a size down\\" from you pants.

Note: I was given a sample of this product in exchange for a review and demonstration.

Hope this helps!

📍 Bottom line: would I recommend this product to one of my friends?
👍 Yes, absolutely.br />
📍 Bottom line: would I recommend this product to one of my friends?
👍 Yes, absolutely.

product_title: TOP LEGGING TL Women's Comfy Versatile Warm Knitted Casual Zip-Up Hoodie Jackets in Colors
review_headline: Cute hoodie made with thermal material
review_body:
I wear lots of sweaters/sweatshirts/hoodies, because I tend to be cold a lot, and I like to layer. Plus, I live in the Northeast, so warm clothes are a must!

I chose this hoodie in purple, and I love the color. It is a beautiful vibrant purple and it is just what I wanted.

The fabric is unlike any hoodie I have had before. The thermal material is just like you would expect - that sort of thin, waffle-like material that you would find with something like thermal bottoms.

I put that the fit was somewhat small, because this has a slim, tight fit. I chose size medium, and I am 5'7" and about 125lbs, and the hoodie is not loose on me. I usually wear a size 8, which is why I chose size M. I am happy with the fit as it has a nice look to it, compared to some of my baggier, more casual hoodies. Also this is sort of long on the torso and the sleeves, which I like, as tops are often too short on me.

It does have a zipper, pockets (which even fit my iPhone 6, which is nice!) and a hood with drawstring.

This is perfect for end-of-summer mornings and evenings, as the crisp fall weather is starting to move in, and good for year round when you need some extra warmth. Overall a cute hoodie!

I received a discount on this product in exchange for my honest review.

product_title: Womens Lace Bra Tops Wirefree Padded Sleeping Daily Bra (4pack-4 colors)
review_body:
Very, very comfortable, padded wire free bra top. Off the shoulder lace gives it a sexy look, while the padding offers coverage. The super stretchy material moves and stretches with your body. The lace is also very stretchy and soft. I found the padding a little too much for me. It is a round pad directly in the center. It is a bit thicker than I usually wear, but offered excellent coverage. The off the shoulder lace, would be better if it was on the shoulder, I feel that it would be even more supportive that way. I love the no wire. I hate wearing wires, they are extremely uncomfortable for me. I got this with the intention of wearing it under a couple dresses that need a little extra coverage than a regular bra offers. It is extremely comfortable, and is a nice addition to my lingerie drawer.

product_title: SAYFUT Waist Cincher Trainer Body Tummy Girdle Control Corset Sport Shaper Belly
review_headline: I am by all means satisfied only because I bought 2 so I was able ...
review_body: I bought this item about a week ago and it came quicker than I expected. I am by all means satisfied only because I bought 2 so I was able to use one of them when they arrived. I am a 5'5 athletic built female and I wear a size medium shirt, prior to the purchase I read reviews so I strongly encourage you to do the same before buying this! Most of the reviews stated the item ran in a smaller fit but that's the purpose of using a waist trainer right? Well I received both of the Waist Trainers I purchased one for me & one for my mom (M&XL) I hate to pass up a great bargain and like I said it came QUICKER THAN I EXPECTED so I was pretty excited.. only to find that the Medium was more like an XtraSmall and the XtraLarge fit more like a Medium. The quality is very nice, and it has the right fit just as long as you have the right size. It's not so visible under clothes & there are little breathing holes throughout the entire stitching so the overall quality rating I would give it a 3.7.. I wasn't so found with the fact it's not true to size and it doesn't look like the item in the picture. And if you're wondering I kept the XL because it fits perfect & I gave the Medium to my roommate who weighs like 110lbs and she loves it. " Moral of the story " : BUY IT!! BUT MAKE SURE YOU GET IT ATLEAST ONE SIZE BIGGER THAN YOUR SHIRT SIZE (maybe 2 sizes if you want it to be comfortable) OR ELSE YOU ARE GOING TO BE UPSET WHEN IT COMES IN THE MAIL :) by the way that's the Medium compared to my MacBook in the photo attachment.. it was really small.

product_title: Bepei Women's Long Sleeves One Button Open Front Wraps Soft Cardigan Sweater
review_headline: ~~ Order MEDIUM if you are a SIZE 10 ~~
review_body:
Ordering this in the coffee color I was excited to try this out once it arrived. It so happened that the weather turned rather cold today so it was PERFECT for wearing this new cardigan out. LOVE IT! The fabric (95% nylon, 5% spandex) is super soft making this really comfortable to wear along with being warm.

I ordered a MEDIUM as I am a size 10. The fit is good. My only comment would be that the sleeves are just long enough. (I do have quite long arms.) With just one button, it is easy to do up and still have a loose fit. The cardigan drapes well and looks classy.

Would I recommend this to others? Yes! Product received in exchange for an honest opinion. Thanks, Liz

product_title: Bepei Women's Long Sleeves One Button Open Front Wraps Soft Cardigan Sweater
review_headline: The fabric is soft and comfortable to be worn all day long
review_body:
This wrap style cardigan comes in so many colors to choose from. I got it in coffee color and it looks true to the pictures and fits well too. I am relieved when I do not have to measure and match my size and just order what I usually wear. The sleeves of this cardigan reach my wrists as shown in the picture. There is a button in the front if you want to wrap it around. The fabric is soft and comfortable to be worn all day long. The stitching is seamless and solid. I can easily wash it in the washing machine. I bought a neutral color so that I can pair it with any color of clothes, dress and pants.
Sample provided without any obligations.

product_title: Bepei Women's Long Sleeves One Button Open Front Wraps Soft Cardigan Sweater
review_headline: Awesome piece to add to any wardrobe
review_body:
I was so excited when I pulled this cardigan out. with all the awesome color choices I had a hard time deciding which one I wanted but I decided on the green, it caught my eye immediately. It's a beautiful dark green color and the material is soft but not overly soft. I LOVE the asymmetric hem because it gives it character and makes it a new favorite in my closet. It's wears beautifully because of that hem too. It's not snug on part of the body.
I got an XL to wear over clothes and I think it will do perfectly. The body would be fine no matter what I'm wearing but the sleeves my be a problem with a thicker sweater or sweatshirt. So if you wear really thick clothes you may want to get a bigger. This would be an amazing accessory to turn any summer dress into an appropriate fall/winter outfit.
It's on the light side so it can be worn as a permanent wardrobe piece for the day or a light jacket that easily slips on and off when entering buildings. There is only one button at the top close to the neck. The button itself is super cute.
I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion but the opinion expressed is all my own.

product_title: Bepei Women's Long Sleeves One Button Open Front Wraps Soft Cardigan Sweater
review_headline: Love this unique style - soft fabric is very comfortable, fits perfectly, and looks great too!
review_body:
[[VIDEOID:a4649bab0c2811ea32924937a23a3615]]When I saw this Bepei one button cardigan I was really excited to give it a try, because it's totally different from anything else in my closet. Now that I've had it for a while, I am so impressed with the design and quality. The one button style is almost like a cross between a cardigan sweater, a wrap, and a poncho. If worn open, it just feels and looks like a comfortable, flowy sweater. When the oversized button is fastened, it gets more of the poncho type look. I love the asymmetric way that it diagonally goes across my body when fastened, while still keeping my arms and torso covered so they stay warm. The open design at the bottom creates nice movement as I walk around. The fabric is extremely soft and feels great against my skin. I chose the grey color which has a nice bit of heather color variation to it - I like that it is neutral enough to go with anything in my wardrobe while being a bit different from the standard black. The style is versatile enough that I can wear it to work or just around running errands, but also can dress it up over a fancier outfit and still look great. I know that I will be wearing this Bepei sweater a lot over the fall and winter - it's perfect for walking outside on a chilly evening! Itypically wear a size 8 or 10 and ordered the size Large based on the measurements provide in the item description - the sweater fits me very comfortably.

I'm very glad that I was able to order this as a free promotional sample in order to evaluate and provide my honest review.

product_title: Bepei Women's Long Sleeves One Button Open Front Wraps Soft Cardigan Sweater
review_headline: A perfect, fall piece of clothing to complement all your outfits!
review_body:
[[VIDEOID:5d7f2d6ab6d3b76c0e82084b2b4b7d8f]]This review is for the Bepei® Women One Button Wrap-Style Cardigan Black.

This cardigan is well made! It is designed with a thick, soft fabric and is ultra-soft against my skin! This is the perfect, quintessential fall piece that will complement all your outfits and works great over all tops and dresses!

The cardigan looks great buttoned or unbuttoned. I usually just throw it on over whatever I am wearing when I go out because it does a great job of keeping the chill off my skin and I am nice and warm. This is also great because you can take it off, throw it into your bag, and it doesn't wrinkle - so pull it out later and wear it again!

If you go traveling, and don't want to carry a lot of bulky warm jackets or sweaters - throw this into your suitcase! This is great for going out at night or just walking around shopping during the daytime! It is very versatile. I got the black color but I am seriously thinking about getting a few more colors to complement other outfits!

The seams are flawless and well stitched. The button is brown wood and looks good when open or closed. The length is also perfect! I am 5'8 and it doesn't sit up too high. I also got the XXL because I am a size 16 however, next time I think I will get the XL as this one is a little big. Maybe order a size down! 5/5 stars for design, craftsmanship and value for such a great staple wardrobe piece!

review_headline: interesting purchase..  nice bulky sweater BUT...

The seller tried to convey difference in sizing of women in China to U.S. women. Looking at the picture and guessing that even if it was not quite my size it would fit with all that extra room on the model in the picture I took a chance on ordering it. In that I was correct… raglan sleeve quite roomy and girth around sweater was very big going around the waist. Sleeves were short and if rolled up could be a 3/4 sieve. The length sure doesn't hit below the hips as pictured… more like at my waist. I wear an extra large. So I could possibly wear this sweater but sure not like it is pictured on the model. I decided to give it to someone who it looks much better on with the sleeve length hitting the wrist where it is supposed to (even tho the  hem length didn't hit below her hips either). Hope this helps anyone else looking to purchase it.

product_title: Ska Studio Shaper Shorts Levantacola with Buttlifter and Thigh Slimmer (127FA)
review_headline: Having sciatica I suffer from a lot of pain pretty much on a daily basis where I really cannot ...
review_body:
Having sciatica I suffer from a lot of pain pretty much on a daily basis where I really cannot do any of the things I love to do daily. Wearing really well made shaper shorts helps the pain tremendously and makes it easier to do things I enjoy like house cleaning, gardening, cooking, painting in my studio, building furniture, laying tile, etc., I have been wearing these Ska Studio Shaper Shorts Levantacola with Buttlifter and Thigh Slimmer for two days now after I hand washed them and hung them to dry. I cannot tell you how they have helped decrease my pain and how extremely comfortable they are. I am truly truly amazed!! They are a firm compression yet not an uncomfortable compression like many other brands that I own. I really have to say Ska Studio Shaper Shorts is the most comfortable compression out of all my shape wear, and I have a ton of it due to my sciatica.

I love the way they are made with cotton on the inside making it very soft to your skin and you will not sweat in these shaper shorts like many other brands. They are surged on all seams with no lose threads. Very very professional.

They look fabulous under my jeans, not bulky at all. The butt is a great lifter due to how it is made. It really does make your butt look very nice. I have never worn shape wear that has the butt cut out like this but I have to say I like t a lot. It is not uncomfortable in any way.

The waste and thigh has a silicone like material that keeps the shaper in place. I had no issues with the waste rolling down or the thighs rolling up. I really love these and they have become my favorite shaper’s that I own.

I am 5’2 118lbs and I ordered the small and it fit me perfectly. I normally wear an extra small so I did size up one size as the ad states to do and I believe that sizing up one size was smart as I think an extra small would have been very uncomfortable and way to tight. The thing with shaper wear is to not cut off your circulation and to not have them so tight that they are putting pressure on your internal organs as this can cause health risks. So, make sure you order a size up and if you do not want such a firm compression order two sizes up as the material these are made out of will still give you outstanding compression two sizes up. I am positive I could wear a medium and be just fine.

I received these Ska Studio Shaper Shorts Levantacola with Buttlifter and Thigh Slimmer By Ska Studio in exchange for my honest and unbiased review and opinion. I would recommend this shaper shorts for many reasons. They are very professionally made, cotton lined, added bonus of lifting your butt, and extremely comfortable. Highly recommended. 5++ If my review was helpful to you please rate it. Thank you :)

I like to wear it when I am going out, and it is actually one of the shirts that I do not fold up and that I put on a clothes hanger. It is a great shirt, and it is pretty affordable too.

product_title: Dasksell Raglan Baseball / Blend Long Sleeve T-shirt
review_headline: This is a comfortable, easy to wear shirt
review_body: This is a comfortable, easy to wear shirt.  The fit looks and feels very good.  Great for wearing in cooler weather under a short sleeve button down shirt, buttoned or unbutton.  The variety of colors allows me to wear it under different short sleeve shirts.  Seemed to wrinkle a little, but I hang it up to avoid wrinkling.  I like the different blend of materials. Comfortable just wearing around the house.

product_title: Dasksell Raglan Baseball / Blend Long Sleeve T-shirt
review_body: You're not a man until you've worn the Tri Onyx version of this s***. Mature, confident, in-control. Buy in 2 sizes so you get the perfect fit... Trust me, you'll wear both. Long sleeves look great under t shirts and add a confident sophistication.  Great for that \\"lean, mean, panty-dropper machine\\" look.    Roll up your sleeves and get to work... in style ;)

product_title: Lightweight Faux Fur Sherpa Leather Fleece Vest Jackets with EttelLut Hairband
review_body: I have been wanting a moto jacket for awhile since they are popular on Stitch Fix. This one is well made and lined. The colors and pattern are nice. It fits a tad smaller than expected. I ordered the small and it's slightly snug on the bottom. So, if you're not sure make sure you order up to the next size, or if you're in between sizes. My only complaint is that the zipper doesn't zip smoothly, which is minor given the great price of this stylish coat. I received this item discounted for my honest review. All opinions are my own.

product_title: Lightweight Faux Fur Sherpa Leather Fleece Vest Jackets with EttelLut Hairband
review_body: The moto jacket appears to be well made and is lined. It's a very nice looking jacket. It does run small, but the sleeves were a little long. My zipper sticks a little, but I'll probably be able to fix it with some wax. Overall, I'm very happy with the jacket. It looks sharp and will be great for the fall weather. I did receive the jacket at a reduced price in exchange for writing an honest review.

product_title: Lightweight Faux Fur Sherpa Leather Fleece Vest Jackets with EttelLut Hairband
review_body:
This jacket is really cute and very warm. It is "quilted" on the outside and lined on the inside. The quality and material are both "high end", well made with very durable material and stitching. I do wish that it had some sort of collar, it just looks a little funny when zipped up but not that big of a deal. The sizing is a little odd. It is shorter than a normal jacket (most Moto jackets are) which wouldn't be a huge deal if the band at the bottom wasn't so tight. I wear a size L/XL & size 16 so I ordered an XL jacket. The jacket fits a little loose in all areas except the bottom band (fits more like a Medium). Since I will be wearing it zipped up I just stretched the band out and now it fits properly and proportionate.

** I received this product at a discounted price for my honest, unbiased review. **

product_title: Lightweight Faux Fur Sherpa Leather Fleece Vest Jackets with EttelLut Hairband
review_body: I purchased the Cropped French Terry Doubl Breasted Jacket. Really cute with the double buttons and the collar stays perfectly flat. I like how the lining is slightly frayed. It adds to the appearance of it. It ran true to size for me. It is more cropped than it appears in the picture though. The jacket is made of mostly cotton so it did shrink a little bit after washing and drying. The jacket is textured too and I love that about it. All of the products from this seller are of much higher quality than I expected. They all also look better in person. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my review. The black cardigan can be dressed up or down.  It has real pockets too. The material is thick and not cheap. The sleeves are 3/4 length but overall I expect it to add enough warmth in the coming months.  The open front zipper waist blazer jacket fits perfectly. The colors are great for fall. It is fuzzy and warm. I wanted this mostly because I thought the zipper waist was a really unique feature. It looks really interesting in person. The zipper also allows it to become a crop jacket at times too. It is lined on the inside. I would have liked for the jacket to have pockets, though I suppose I will be fine without them. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my review.

product_title: Lightweight Faux Fur Sherpa Leather Fleece Vest Jackets with EttelLut Hairband
review_body: Love this! I have a larger bust and I was worried about that, but it fits perfectly!

product_title: Lightweight Faux Fur Sherpa Leather Fleece Vest Jackets with EttelLut Hairband
review_body:
This Moto jacket is super well made, I was pleasantly surprised.

Since I see a little bit I really pay attention to the seams and the zippers and other little details like that and from what I see the seams are straight, the grommets are well made, and the zippers do not snag. So it passed all my little tests.

I ordered this in a M and I'm normally a M, it did fit, however it was a little snug in the chest area (I'm a 34c), so if you run that size or bigger I would order a size up

I wore mine with a white tee and some jeans and heels and got a lot of compliments, it really pulls an outfit together and is good for day or night!

I recieved this at a discount in exchange for my honest, unbiased review.

product_title: Lightweight Faux Fur Sherpa Leather Fleece Vest Jackets with EttelLut Hairband
review_headline: Very CUTE but runs a little Small
review_body:
I recently purchased this cute light blazer jacket at a discount for my honest review.
I looked at the measurements and decided to go with an XL. Normally I wear a Large in most of my tops, but jackets seems to always run tighter on me. I am a broader girl in the shoulders and bust.
The black is a true black color. The jacket is like a sweatshirt material so it moves easily and will have a little warmth to it. The sleeves are 3/4 length and fit nicely. It does fit in my shoulders pretty well but even the XL I bought is a little too small. This is why I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5. I feel it isn't quite true to size but runs a little small. I wish it came in and closed more in front. I feel like it needs more material around the back to get it to close. This would be much better on a smaller busted women however I am a size 38C and not really much bigger than normal. There is NO clasp in the front to secure it shut. I couldn't quite tell in the picture if it closed or not. It does not. The front two pockets are cute and they are functional. There is a gather in the sleeves which adds character and I think is very cute. I would also say this is more of a CROP length on me. I am 5'7 and it comes right at my true waist. I think this jacket would look perfect with some cute jeans/leggings, a white tank and a statement necklace.
I live in AZ and our winters do NOT get cold so something like this is just perfect when running around doing errands and doctor appointments, but also cute for going out at night with the girls or a date with my hubby.

product_title: Lightweight Faux Fur Sherpa Leather Fleece Vest Jackets with EttelLut Hairband
review_headline: Beautiful jacket and very well made
review_body: I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review.  Beautiful jacket and very well made.  Fits very true to size.

product_title: Lightweight Faux Fur Sherpa Leather Fleece Vest Jackets with EttelLut Hairband
review_body: Love this jacket!  It fits perfect (I wear a size 12 dress/blouse and ordered this jacket in a size large).  I love the tailored fit.  The quality of the material is extremely nice, thick and good quality.  Snaps are easy to snap/unsnap.  The jacket is lined.  This is going to be such an asset to my work wardrobe to wear with a skirt or slacks.  Very reasonably priced.  I received this item at a discount in exchange for my honest, unbiased review and will buy more in other colors/patterns at a non-discounted price.

product_title: Lightweight Faux Fur Sherpa Leather Fleece Vest Jackets with EttelLut Hairband
review_headline: This blazer looks and feels much more higher quality than you'd expect for the price!
review_body:
This blazer is gorgeous! It is made with a much higher quality than I expected too! It is thick and warm, and also has a little stretch to It. I do wish it was lined though and had a button to close it. It has some nice pockets on the side. and the cut looks great, hitting me at my smallest part, the waist. This makes a great layering piece over just about anything I'm wearing and ads some additional warmth and style!

I also really love the 3/4 sleeve with rushing detail. It feels and looks great!

I'm size 6 and normally get a medium. I ordered this in a large and it was a perfect fit.

The blazer is super comfortable and really ads some style to whatever I'm wearing! The material is also soft as well. The jacket is sewn together nicely and I didn't notice any loose threads. It has nice stitching and looks much more higher quality then what you pay for it. I got it in black and absolutely love it! This color also go great with everything!

I highly recommend this jacket to anyone who would like a soft, somewhat stretchy blazer that looks and feels high quality but is still very inexpensive!

I was given this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.

product_title: Lightweight Faux Fur Sherpa Leather Fleece Vest Jackets with EttelLut Hairband
review_headline: Versatile blazer that can be dressed up or down.
review_body: I love this blazer because it is very well made. The material is 50% cotton and 50% polyester. As far as I can tell, there are no loose stitching or hanging threads. I like that the blazer has functional pockets (sometimes other blazers have them for decoration only). There is a ruching detail on the sleeves and two pockets in the front.  I wish the ruching detail is done twice on each sleeve because it is a little bit loose for my arms. I also wish that there is a button in the front to close the blazer. For reference, I am 5'2" and 105 lbs and ordered size small. The blazer is a bit loose on me but still fits well. I am glad I had the opportunity to get this blazer at a discounted price and write a review about it.

review_body:
First off I will say I love the quality of this coat and the material but it just did not fit me. I wear a 12/14 which it says size Large is but I have big shoulders and boobs and this would not close across my chest. My bust is a 40 D and I say I have broad shoulders and was bummed this jacket didn't fit. I was able to get it on, just not close to zipping it and it did feel tight on my shoulders like I might rip the fabric if I stretched too much. I wish they made an XL as I think that would be perfect but they only go up to a L. I would recommend this coat though to anyone looking for a lightweight coat. It has great pockets and is stretchy. I was worried about it being wrinkled because its cotton but its lays as it should and looks nice.

review_body: I got this product in Dec. 2014, for my husband who has nerve damage in his hands.  It has met and exceeded our expectations. The release action took some training for him, but it is a snap now.  The quality of the leather and buckle is top grade.  You will not be disappointed.

Definitely suggest air drying to avoid shrinkage. Anyhow, I received this product at a discounted rate for my honest opinion. Living in Southern California the summers are very hot and this is a perfect tank to wear with shorts out and about or around the house. I'm not a huge fan of the large ties on the back but they are not a deal breaker as I think the front of the shirt is really cute. product_title: DesertWolf Vintage Leather Casual Hiking Backpack - Messenger Bag (Brown)
review_body:
[[VIDEOID:ad67fce3bc36c38978e26a7cae336891]] What a great backpack! When I received a sample in exchange for an honest review, I wasn't expecting anything beyond the normal backpack designs, but there are a number of nice features you don't usually find that are included in this one:

=All of the leather is either double layer or backed by a tough nylon (?that's what it looks and feels like) fabric.
=There is a hidden handle inside a zipper slot on the back
=The shoulder straps are also hidden inside the zipper slot
=As an alternative, there is a single long shoulder strap that can be used in place of the backpack shoulder straps
=Everything is lined with a tough fabric that appears to be nylon
=There are pockets galore everywhere
=I managed to load a 13\\" aluminum Macbook into the main cavity, as well as a couple of very thick books
=Brass finish on all of the hardware; combined with the shiny brown leather, this thing looks really cool
=Multiple snap shackles allow you to change carrying straps at will

This bag looks fantastic, and will certainly last for many years. I am very impressed with the quality and attention to detail, and it has become my favorite bag for carrying my computer and numerous peripherals, as well as books, supplies, cables, etc. etc. Two very happy thumbs up for this wonderful backpack!

Be sure to watch the video - you can see all the features and experience how the bag works!

product_title: DesertWolf Vintage Leather Casual Hiking Backpack - Messenger Bag (Brown)
review_headline: An affordable genuine leather bag that is roomy and well made...
review_body:
This bag is, in a word - AWESOME. I have a ton of different backpacks and bags, and this is one of the best so far.

Just by touching the leather on the outside, I could tell that it was a great quality backpack. The leather is so soft and supple and has that scent that only genuine leather has. The gold accents are a nice touch and really add to the overall look.

The bag is comfortable to carry in my opinion. Since the bag comes with adjustable straps, it is very easy for me to get a fit that is just right for me.

As far as storage goes, this bag has plenty of pockets. There are two zippered pockets on the outside, two side pockets and an inside zippered pocket as well. The main compartment is very roomy. I was able to put my 15" laptop inside of the bag, and I still had room left over for me to store some other odds and ends. I received the bag for review and love it. I started carrying it around with me last week and I have already received quite a few compliments on it. If you are looking for an affordable genuine leather bag that is roomy and well made, this is the one for you.

product_title: High Quality Leather Magentic Money Clip Wallet & Credit Card Holder w/ RFID Blocking Technology.
review_body:
This RFID money clip is made of super incredibly soft, supple leather. Usually when I buy a new leather wallet or money clip, it takes some time before it is broken in and feels comfortable in my pocket. Right out of the box this one feels at home in your hand and pocket.
The stitching and seams are well done and feel like they will last a long time without any fraying or tearing.

The money clip is unusually wide but that just means more storage. I personally only carry 6 cards, ID, a few business cards and some cash, and I've got tons of space left for more. This money clip can easily accommodate double that with ease and still remain slim and manageable. I really like the amount of pockets incorporated into the design of it as well. ID pocket, large center pocket, smaller our pocket, and 3 pocket for cards.

The look of of the money clip is simple and understated, for me that's great because I'm not into flashy accessories. Also, the fact that it is RFID secure is not advertised in the branding, which is nice. I've used those paper sleeves for my cards before but they get annoying fast. Not to mention they wear out constantly. This entire wallet is RFID secure! No more paper sleeves. Ever.

Overall, a very nicely constructed, larger sized, secure wallet that I will recommend to anyone I know. My one and only issue with this money clip is the ID pocket does not have a opening in it so you can easily push your ID out, and it fits in there so snugly that it's very difficult to access quickly.

I received this item in exchange for my impartial opinion and honest review.

product_title: High Quality Leather Magentic Money Clip Wallet & Credit Card Holder w/ RFID Blocking Technology.
review_body: Very nice wallet.  I've had a slim wallet for the past couple of years and doubt I'll ever go back to a regular wallet.  As for this one, I was able to easily get 6 credit cards, 2 paper cards and my drivers license into it and still have room for more.  The money clip/holder is the only thing I would prefer be a little different.  It hold 4 folded (one time) bills fairly securely.  I would hesitate to put any more than that in the clip portion.  Also, I agree with another reviewer that I would have preferred a metal (or leather-covered metal) clip instead of the leather flip which secures with magnets.  What I may do with this wallet is remove the clip portion altogether and just put bills into the center section of the wallet.  I usually don't carry a lot of cash anyway.  The leather seems to be high quality, and the wallet is super thin.  A solid 4 stars.  I did receive the wallet at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

product_title: High Quality Leather Magentic Money Clip Wallet & Credit Card Holder w/ RFID Blocking Technology.
review_headline: I really wanted to love it.............
review_body: OK ..  I received the clip today, I was kinda excited to get it ( for my son). Now for the nice things about this clip, it seems to be made of nice smooth yet firm leather.  It has a pocket for an ID that has a clear window . The plastic is pretty thick and I believe it would  hold up for quite a while and take the pressure of sliding an ID in and out when need be. It has 3 slots for credit/debit cards and each slot has the RFID blocking fabric, which is nice and each area of the wallet/clip has this feature ensuring security. The wallet/clip has 2 additional larger slots for other items or addition cards/cash.  Now for the part that I do not like......... the clip! This is the part that really bothers me. I expected it to have some sort of pressure metal clip covered in leather.. it doesn't.  The clip is a leather flap that is secured with a magnet. There is a magnet in the flap of leather and a magnet in the wallet and thin magnet at that. So I tried to see how much this magnet would hold SECURELY! I started out with about 15 bills............  wouldn't hold, went to 12 bills, still wouldn't hold....went to 8 it finally started to grab the other magnet, but only after I flattened the crease smooth.  I went to 10 bills and again it barely held the cash in place. So I shook the wallet and the cash fell out. Now for something that went to great lengths  to secure your identity and credit card, not much thought was given to the clip. I also would be very hesitant to put any cash in the clip anyway for fear that it would become unattached pulling it out of a pocket and all the money would drop loose to the floor. Like I said I really wanted to love it and there are many things about it I do like. It is a nice quality, well constructed and the RFID Blocking Fabric in each slot,  but I think it needs to have a much more powerful magnet or use a pressure clip covered in leather to  hold the cash more securely.  I received this item at a discount for my unbiased opinions.

product_title: Premium Quality Leather Wallet w/ RFID Blocking, Excellent Credit Card Protector - Stop Electronic Pick Pocketing and Identity Theft - Blocks Identity Theft and Credit Card Data Breaches By Blocking Rfid Scans, 100% Money Back Guarantee!
review_headline: classy wallet with identity theft protection!
review_body:
If you are anything like me and worry about security when it comes to your wallet, then I believe this is the wallet for you or anyone out there! It arrives very nicely packaged and shortly after you purchase it. It has a slick, classy feel to it. Appears to be leather. Has a lot of compartments for cards and even ID card. As well as cash and section for coins. I purchased this wallet for my stepdad who's birthday is coming up and I figured he'd enjoy this as a gift. This wallet has RFID blocking technology which helps prevent identity theft. This will help my stepdad feel secure, since he's always worried about identity theft.

I received this wallet with a discount in exchange for my honest opinion.

product_title: Premium Quality Leather Wallet w/ RFID Blocking, Excellent Credit Card Protector - Stop Electronic Pick Pocketing and Identity Theft - Blocks Identity Theft and Credit Card Data Breaches By Blocking Rfid Scans, 100% Money Back Guarantee!
review_body:
I received this product in return for my honest review.
I wasn't quite sure how to test that the wallet was RFID blocking but I read in the reviews where someone put their work ID in it and tried to open a door which I thought was cool and sounded like a good way to test, since my school ID does work to unlock doors when it is in my current wallet. So I put my school ID in the pouch closest to the outside of the wallet and it did work, as in, it would not open the door and the scanner could not sense it. I thought that was pretty cool, and is good enough proof for me that this wallet actually does what it says it does. My boyfriend is always worried about people stealing his information, so I know he will really love this wallet! I'm sure he'll do some tests of his own as well! Aside from testing what the wallet does, it also looks and feels very nice, I love the quality. It has ample amount of space inside, which is good with the amount of cards my boyfriend has. So aside from the RFID blocking, I also think this is just a really nice good-quality and good-looking wallet.

product_title: Premium Quality Leather Wallet w/ RFID Blocking, Excellent Credit Card Protector - Stop Electronic Pick Pocketing and Identity Theft - Blocks Identity Theft and Credit Card Data Breaches By Blocking Rfid Scans, 100% Money Back Guarantee!
review_headline: This might not be a great way of testing the RFID blocking
review_body: While this wallet a bit big for me, I tested the RFID blocking and it seems to work.  I put my work badge in my wallet and tried to unlock a door and it didn't read.  This might not be a great way of testing the RFID blocking, but I felt good enough about it to confirm that it has some sort of RFID blocking.  Anyways, like I mentioned before, the wallet is a little big for me, but my dad, who just so happen to be in need of a new wallet, seems to love it.  After I told him about it blocking RFID, he was very impressed (he had heard about people stealing credit cards via RFID readers on the news) so I am very happy that he now has some peace of mind over that.  He loves how there are so many card pockets, and because he's happy with the wallet, I am very happy with the wallet. The price is nice (although I must disclose that I got this wallet for a reduced price in exchange for my unbiased review), and the leather (I'm not sure if it's genuine leather or not) is soft and the wallet itself feels sturdy. If you want a good (or at least decent) RFID blocking wallet and want to have lots of space (I mean lots of space) for cards/pictures, etc, I definitely recommend this wallet.

review_body:

I bought this bow tie and also bought the bow tie made by Electric Styles. I will be keeping this one from Neon Nightlife and returning the other. This tie has the power wire from the the center of the back of the tie making it easy to hide the wire under your collar. The bow tie from Electric Styles has the wire come from the side which makes it difficult to hide the power wire. Also this bow tie made from higher quality fabric.

I'll let the attached photo speak for itself. The top bow tie is made by Neon Nightlife. The bottom bow tie is made by Electric Styles.

Overall, awesome product, bright, sleek, unique. Totally recommend.

review_headline: The material is very nice, i was impressed
review_body:
The color is very true to the picture. I am 5'9, so i purchased the large in grey and ,for me,it is on the verge of being almost to short. Nothing can be seen by regular movement but if you are to lean forward be cautious! The material is very nice, i was impressed.
the fit on the arms was very nice as well and they were not too tight. All in all i do enjoy this dress and do plan on wearing it! The only con would be the length, i just wish it was a half inch longer, but i am rather tall so that could be it too!

product_title: AW Fashion's Whiskey Tango Foxtrot - Military WTF Humor Premium Men's T-Shirt (Medium, Sports Grey)
review_headline: This an awesome t-shirt that I really like
review_body: This  an awesome t-shirt that I really like. It is the exact size that I ordered and it is a nice shirt. It fits just like it should and I love the saying on the shirt. I am from a military family and this is humor that we love and my family laughed so hard when they seen it and they all wanted one as well. The shirt washes well and doesn't shrink either. I received this product to share my honest thoughts and opinions about it.

product_title: AW Fashion's Whiskey Tango Foxtrot-Military WTF Humor Premium Men's T-Shirt (White)
review_body:
If you don't want to wear a shirt with the expansion of WTF on it, this is the next best thing. It will certainly turn heads. It is a great way to meet strangers as somebody will certainly say something to you about the shirt. Is that a bad thing? Just tell them you got it from Amazon. With an eight year old, it was interesting explaining the shirt to him since there is nothing explicitly on the shirt. I suspect he thinks I didn't tell him everything.

I like the multiple colors available for the shirt, though I only got one, the white one. I'm also fond of the fact that the shirt is 100% cotton. The shirt is very comfortable and so far has done well with the dryer, not affecting the printing at all. Collar not too tight with plenty of room to breathe.

Might have to pick up some of these for Christmas.

Received product at a promotional price with promise of an honest, unbiased review.

product_title: AW Fashion's Gandalf Science Is Magic - GANDALF'S MAGICAL SCIENCE Premium Men's T-Shirt
review_body:
Looking for a shirt that fully expresses how you feel? Having a hard day or dealing with people that you want to scream, well this is the shirt for you.

Anyone who is familiar with some military wording will get a really good laugh out of this shirt.

I love the color I picked, bright red, love the color and this shirt can say the words that you might not want to say at the moment, but you may be thinking it.

I received this item at a discounted cost in exchange for my honest opinion

product_title: AW Fashion's Rand Paul 2016 Presidential Campaign Logo Men's T-Shirt
review_headline: This shirt is good quality, it is fairly thick material and the ...
review_body:
This shirt is good quality, it is fairly thick material and the Rand logo is printed on the front of the shirt. When I received the shirt the logo was crisp and bright, after the first wash I noticed a little bit of fading but it was minor and what I would expect, the shirt size stayed true and it did not shrink. I ordered the large and it is the perfect size. Overall quality is good and I would recommend this if you are in the market for a Rand Paul shirt.

Disclosure of Material Connection: I received one or more of the products or services mentioned above at a discount or for free in the hope that I would write a review about it. I am disclosing this in accordance with the Federal Trade Commission's 16 CFR, Part 255: "Guides Concerning the Use of Endorsements and Testimonials in Advertising."

product_title: AW Fashion's Rand Paul 2016 Presidential Campaign Logo Men's T-Shirt
review_body: I love this shirt! The fit is as expected. The graphics on the shirt are bright and bold. They seem to be well-adhered to the shirt, so I don't foresee any issues with peeling. The shirt is a little on the thin side, but this is how I prefer my t-shirts, so I see that as a plus. I will definitely be wearing this a lot! This product was provided complimentary by the seller in exchange for my honest review.

product_title: AW Fashion's SUP Funny UPS Parody Premium Men's T-Shirt (XX-Large, Brown)
review_body:
This shirt is well made. I hate buying clothes online. You never know if you are getting factory rejects. The quality of the seems and the alignment of the pattern is always something that worries me about shopping for clothes online. This T-Shirt was received with no quality issues. Each seem was nicely sewn. The logo is center. The paint looks is described. It was true to size and didn't shrink when it was washed. I'm very pleased with the quality of this T-Shirt.

PROS:
Soft material
Well painted
Fits as expected
Preshrunk

CONS:
Non experienced

Size Accuracy: *5*

product_title: AW Fashion's SUP Funny UPS Parody Men's T-Shirt (Brown, X-Large)
review_body:
I'm super pleased! The shirt fits exactly as expected, I got a brown XL. The T-shirt is Gildan brand, I am always pleased with their superior quality. The shirt is a thick cotton--durable and long lasting feeling and the logo is screened on. I turn shirts inside out to wash them, so I'd recommend that with this one too! Overall, it's great, I suspect it to last a long time and get a lot of laughs! My husband is dyslexic, so this shirt is right up his alley!

**I received this shirt at a reduced price in exchange for my honest opinion**

product_title: AW Fashion's SUP Funny UPS Parody Premium Men's T-Shirt (Maroon)
review_body: I got this shift for my husband. I showed him the picture when i was ordering and he said he would wear it. I was able to get this in exchange for my honest review. Once this came in the mail my husband wore it that day. It fit well. It is made with 100% pre-shrunk cotton The color of yellow really pops on that brown. The screen print and t-shirt held up great in washer and dryer.I have  washed it several times so far and it still looks new.  This is made of a nice quality material. He wore it to the store and a few people told him they liked his shift. I think we will see what other shifts this company offers.

product_title: AW Fashion's Scott Walker 2016 Presidential Campaign Logo Men's T-Shirt
review_headline: Show your support, get out and VOTE! #Walker2016
review_body:
[[VIDEOID:18e1633fb034b12fe8e76bc268ea3172]] I am so pumped for the [[ASIN:B013EX3XD0 2016 presidential campaign]]! Aren't you? The drama is on a whole new level! I have my favorites, and I am sure you do too, but I'm kinda curious about this [[ASIN:B013EX1I8M Walker]] guy.

Scott Kevin Walker is the 45th Governor of Wisconsin He's obviously doing a good job because he's been doing it since 2011. The reason we are gonna talk about him today though is because he is a candidate for the [[ASIN:B00WYA8FVU Republican Party]]'s nomination to the 2016 presidential election.

I received some Walker swag this week so I'll try to be nice going forward. It didn't come from the Walker camp, but from a veteran owned company AW Fashions. They hooked me up in return for telling everyone what I honestly thought of their products. I honestly think they make the most [[ASIN:B011802SS2 comfortable T-shirts]] on earth!

Wisconsin governor and [[ASIN:B00I8GG566 vanilla pudding]] made flesh Scott Walker is going through a bit of a slump in his campaign for the White House. After a debate performance that had all the pop and energy of a funeral, Walker's poll numbers took a dive, both nationally and in Iowa. Then he alienated fiscal conservatives and [[ASIN:B011802SS2 Tea Party]] types by signing off on a new taxpayer-funded stadium for the Milwaukee Bucks. Walker needs something new and exciting to drag him out of this rut, so this week he's going to try to recapture the affections of his party by taking direct aim at the one thing conservatives and Republicans hate most: [[ASIN:0893348627 Obamacare]].

While Mr. Walker will not be receiving a vote from me, this high quality comfortable shirt that AW Fashions sent me sure will!

These tee shirts would be wonderful for a Tea Party rally, Republican GOP Presidential debate, a [[ASIN:B00WRBQODC Glenn Beck]] event, or just to show your support around town! The shirts are lite weight, super soft, and thin. The shirt is made of sweat wicking material making it perfect for crossfit, hiking, running, the gym, cycling, surfing, and beach! They are the optimal athletic apparel for both men and women.

Support America and [[ASIN:B00A45G6EA Don't Tread on Me]] with Constitution Conservative Patriotic shirts!

Get a T-Shirt to Support YOUR Favorite Republican GOP President Candidate Today!

*Video Notes*

The shirt the child (Gauge) is wearing in the picture/video is a XXL and not originally meant for him to wear. It does not represent AW Fashions ability to fit. The Music I used was [[ASIN:B00X5MVZ6I Watch Me Whip/Nae Nae by Silento]]. No Copyright Infringement intended. I do not own this music. product_title: AW Fashion's Scott Walker 2016 Presidential Campaign Logo Men's T-Shirt
review_body: I am a Tomoson member and I love it. In exchange for a free, fair, and unbiased review I am sent products AT NO COST TO ME and asked to review them. I check the website everyday and was thrilled with I seen presidential shirts and I applied. I was sent the Scott Walker and am so thrilled. He is my #1 choice for the GOP and I will rock that t-shirt all the time. The image was a little off centered but that doesn’t bother me much. American is in desperate need of change and I am hoping Scott Walker or Macro Rubio is the man to make that change.

review_body:
I placed an order for a medium shirt and the fit was perfect! I prefer not to order clothing on amazon, but I’m glad I got this shirt, because now it’s opened that possibility. Perfect fit, and quick shipping. The material is indeed 100% cotton and it is a very comfortable. I received this at a discount for my honest review.

I will keep updating this review as I wash the shirt.

-------UPDATE-------

It has now been a few weeks since I have been using and washing this shirt. It's probably gone through 20 wash cycles by now. It has shrunk just a tiny bit, and the colors have faded a bit. But that is expected of nearly every shirt which you use for that long.

product_title: Women's Fashion Below the Knee Offic Pencil Skirt USA (Plus Sizes)
review_body:
[[VIDEOID:a59cf0c0ccbe43617e457e40ba24da1f]]This skirt comes in a super cute reusable bag, which I love because anything that helps save the planet is a yes for me. It's also HUGE so it's going to be added to my shopping reusable bags. :)

Ok. Skirt.
The red is RED. It's not a bland kind of red, but more like a vibrant red which is beautiful. The fabric is 75% Polyester, and 25% rayon. Which means it's going to hug you in all the right places.

The waist band is elastic but a thicker band than other skirts that I've had. I actually prefer the longer waist bands that are elastic because it helps them to stay in place. I definitely do not want a skirt that I have to constantly keep pulling up or pulling down. It's annoying, and it's anything but attractive.

I like the length of the skirt, and it's really comfortable. And it looks really really good on! I got the size small and I am 5 foot 2 1/2, and it's perfect. It's a great links and it's beautiful. With all coming up, red is amazing for my wardrobe.

I received this product at a discounted rate. I chose to do the review on my own.

It's the perfect length for this style of skirt.  I debated on whether to get a medium or a large because my size can really go either way but I am very happy with the fit of the large.  I wear this skirt high on my waist and thinks it gives a nice, professional style.  With a pair of heels, this skirt is absolutely dreamy! product_title: Fashionable, First Class Quality, and Comfortable Tank Tops for Women

product_title: Tulle Shirts and Blouses for Women
review_headline: Perfect fit, cute...but does snag easily
review_body:
This is a lovely, silky, flattering shirt! I have to disagree with another reviewer about it not fitting based on cup size alone. Cup size is not the issue, overall chest circumference is...it's not fair to fault the shirt if you didn't measure that beforehand. I followed the sizing chart exactly, purchased a small, and it fit perfectly (and, for the record, I'm a C/D cup!) It's flattering without being tight, and it's appropriate to wear to work.

Here's why I docked it a star:
1) There is a seam that goes around the shirt, under the chest (where you'd expect something like that on an empire/babydoll waist top). It's a bit distracting given the slight shininess of the material, yet it was not really visible in the model photo. I didn't expect it and I feel like it doesn't really belong, but it's a very minor quibble...it still looks lovely overall.
2) A bigger complaint for me is that the material is VERY prone to snagging. As a cat owner, this always matters but is not something I would normally dock a product for. However, the material's sensitivity to snagging is so severe that it snagged on a hangnail on my finger, and then on a nail itself that was only slight rough (not torn) within a short period of time after putting on the shirt. I'm concerned about how long this will hold up as a result.

If this item was more expensive, I might have docked it more points for the snagging issue, but it is a fantastic price for a cute shirt. I purchased this shirt at a slight discount for my honest and unbiased review, which this absolutely is. Hope it helps!

product_title: Look Hot but Stay Cool with These Stunning Dresses Perfect for Summer
review_body:
This dress is so cute! I got the spaghetti strap poppy colored sweetheart neckline dress and it is so cute. I actually do not own any other sweetheart neckline dresses and this was my very first one. I really like the length of this dress as well. It falls just about the knee so it's appropriate for all occasions.It has some button details on the front that really add some adorable detail. I ordered an extra small because I am tall but quite slim. I am nursing my 4 month old and have a full chest but even an extra small was way too big and almost baggy in the front. The material is nice and light and perfect for summer days. I think with a few small alterations it will be adorable on me and still work perfectly.
I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

product_title: Look Hot but Stay Cool with These Stunning Dresses Perfect for Summer
review_body:
The dress I got was the cute little tan one with the rose pattern.

This particular dress does run a bit small, so make sure you take your measurements to make sure you get the right size. (I normally wear a medium or large, depending on the brand. I had to order an extra large in this dress and it fits great.)

It's really nice and flowy, a great summer dress. Added bonus? It has pockets! But, seriously, look how cute that is! It would look awesome with a little belt and a pair of wedges. (Yes, I'm holding a selfie stick in the pic. Don't judge.)

Disclaimer: I received this dress at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

product_title: Look Hot but Stay Cool with These Stunning Dresses Perfect for Summer
review_headline: Great, but order a size or two larger than your actual size.
review_body: This is a lovely little dress.  The design is adorable and the material is light and airy.  My only complaint is that it is smaller than expected.  I purchased another Tulle dress in the same size and that one fits (a little tight, but still pretty), and I can't even get this one over my chest.  This is to be expected with different styles though, so don't let it deter you from adding this cute little dress to your wardrobe!  If you are concerned about it not fitting right, maybe just go up a size or two.  This dress would be great as a light summer dress and I can't wait until I can fit into it and show it off.  I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest review.

product_title: Look Hot but Stay Cool with These Stunning Dresses Perfect for Summer
review_headline: Dress color is more nude/tan than pictured light colored sandy
review_body: The dress fits exactly to the chart, although I had more of a medium sized booty and a small top. I got a small and it fit overall just fine. However, I found that the color of the dress to be more tan than sandy, as the photo suggests. Because of that, it looks awful with my skintone where it looks almost like I'm wearing something a few shades lighter than my skin speckled with flowers. The flower pattern itself is cute though! The background color of the dress really needs to be not as dark as it really is though to look good. As for quality, the material wasn't shear which was quite surprising for how thin it is. However, bright colors like hot pink will still show through. I got this item at a discount, but I am leaving my honest and unbiased opinion here in exchange.

product_title: Look Hot but Stay Cool with These Stunning Dresses Perfect for Summer
review_body:
Disclaimer: I received a discount on this dress in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

This dress fix as expected as far as size goes - I know some people mentioned that it was off, but for me it was right on in the XL size. The reason I took away a star was first, the button closure is super hard to work - it took me a good 2 minutes to get it opened to put on, and it seems like I might have to replace the string holding the button to the dress. Secondly, the armpit areas gape in front and really could use a bust dart, at least in my case. Aside from those issues, I absolutely LOVE this dress. It is so pretty, just the right length for me, and it is flattering even on a size XL which sometimes is not the case. I will add a quick bust dart to my dress, and then it will be perfect. I am not sure if it is just my bust size that is causing the gaping problem or if this is usual, but I am assuming it is me since that happens quite often with the woven dresses I buy.

product_title: Look Hot but Stay Cool with These Stunning Dresses Perfect for Summer
review_headline: Cute and comfy dress, as long as you triple check the sizing
review_body:
This dress is definitely cute and flowy and perfect for summer. The material is lightweight, but it has a liner so I am not worried about it at all. I like the fact that you can remove the halter straps by unbuttoning them. The dress also comes with an extra button, which is always welcome in my house. I did intend on this dress to be for me, and thought I checked the sizing chart throughly, but the image of the chart for the flower dress was missing key bust measurements that I discovered (later of course) the other styles had. While the dress technically fit, it was not flattering at all. I ended up giving it to my much smaller 13 yr old daughter. It is baggy on her, but we solved that by tying the halter top tighter and using a plain white scarf to cinch the waist and it looks nice on her. It is near the end of the summer here, so I'm sure it will be a good fit for her next year.

That being said, I based my rating on the dress itself, not my sizing issues. Take the time to measure yourself and use the company's sizing chart, and you should be fine. I did recieve this summer dress at a discount in exchange for an unbiased and honest review, which I have given here. As long as you size up and make sure to check the chart, this is a great dress.

product_title: Look Hot but Stay Cool with These Stunning Dresses Perfect for Summer
review_headline: Cute dress, but check their size chart image, don't go by Amazon's!
review_body:
I chose the black dress with the bright pink flowers with a low v-neck. The dress is very cute in person, nice fabric, not too short if you're petite (I'm 5'3") however please note that the Amazon-provided "size chart" listed next to the size drop-down menu is NOT used for this dress. They have a third image with a size chart which shows an XL as an 8-10. This does not come close to American standards for sizing. Normally a large would be a 10-12 or 12-14. I normally wear a large dress and a size 14 pants, so I made the mistake of looking at the Amazon size chart and ordering a large. According to their chart, my 38DD chest might not even fit in their XL. I was able to get the dress on but the bodice was tight and didn't sit correctly. They need to remove the Amazon size chart from their listing so people don't make the same mistake as I did.

I contacted the seller for a return/exchange and they were accommodating and friendly, however when I offered to try this dress in an XL, I was told they don't have that size in this dress though Amazon shows they do. I purchased this item at a discount in exchange for an honest, unbiased review.
