review_body: I purchased the black dress with little white flowers at a discount in exchange for an honest, unbiased review. In the photo, you can see an inch or two at the hem are see through, but then you see what looks like a second layer under the rest of the dress. In actuality the girl pictured must be wearing a slip, because the entire dress was see through. I didn't even put it on because I'd have to buy additional clothing to wear under it. That being said, I contacted the seller about returning it since it wasn't as pictured, and they were very responsive and helpful. Also be sure you're checking the size chart in the images - it is drastically different than the Amazon size chart linked on the page.

product_title: Clover Men's Aluminum Wallet
review_body:
A nice everyday carry item. Originally, I purchased to consolidate some of the items I carry with me.

Pros:
It holds your keys, credit cards, ID, and money. The keys don't flop around and are held solidly in place. I was able to add a USB key which fits nicely. Great for the price, there are comparable wallets that are much more expensive. Quality is pretty good.

Cons:
A bit heavy. Clunky to carry in your back pocket. The jagged edges tend to jab you in the butt, which is fine once you start developing a callous. The online video instruction didn't cover what to do with the extra washers. Some were bent and some were plastic.

If this could be a little bit smaller or lighter I would give it more stars. I think based on the design, materials, and the niche market that this appeals to it is hard to come up with a decent product. This does come close to being great though. My biggest disappointment was I expected it to take up less space than conventional wallet and keys, which it doesn't (depending on how fat your wallet is). It simply organizes them better for you than a conventional wallet. A simple TGT wallet and KeySmart key ring comes pretty close as an alternative.

In spite of what it sounds like, I would certainly buy this again. If they come out with a refined version, I would probably buy that too.

product_title: Clover Men's Aluminum Wallet
review_body: Great product.......Already put to use in my daily life!

product_title: Clover Men's Aluminum Wallet
review_headline: If your gonna carry something everyday, you must absolutely LOVE IT!
review_body: First of all, I hardly ever leave reviews online. But I felt like I should definitely share my thoughts regarding this wallet. Its a phenomenal design for a wallet. I have had a leather wallet ever since i can remember, and after 2 days of using this I threw away my leather one. I ordered the Silver one and it looks amazing.  The clear anodized finish is absolutely beautiful. Few times when I have taken it out to pay for something at store , people have asked me first what it is, and where I got it.  It's definitely unique in its look.  Furthermore The wallet offers RFID protection, I have 4 banks cards and 3 of them recently sent me new cards with rf chip in them. I had no idea what that was until i came across this wallet and did some online research. Most banks and credit cards switching over to this new style of cards which supposed to be more secure than standard old magnetic strip cards. The down side of the new cards is that your card data can be skimmed by thieves wirelessly. I'm might be more paranoid than an average user but I think wallet with RFID protection like this one is a must for the future.  I currently carry 4 cards , driver license, and  work id with few dollar bills. I like that I only have to fold my bills in half to make them fit. I initially thought it would not be that comfortable in my pocket since its aluminum frame, but I was surprised of how comfortable it actually is. I commute approx. 3 hrs daily for work and its always in my front pocket. I sometimes even forget its there. I would however like to say that it may take couple of days to get used to the form-factor for using it to open doors. My main house door has an old lock which requires quite of bit effort to open (I been meaning to use WD-40 for months but never did). Since I started using this wallet with keys I have noticed that it requires considerably less effort to open it.  I give  the wallet 5-STARS, I would definitely recommend it to people. I assure you that you will ditch your leather wallet.

product_title: Clover Men's Aluminum Wallet
review_headline: Interesting concept with a lot of room for customization.
review_body: This takes some getting used to because it's so different. There is a strong elastic band to hold your credit cards and a few stacked bills. The other side has four pins that allow for four keys to be held. The clip has to be taken apart so the keys can be put in place but they have to be standard keys. I have a built-in key fob for my car so I can't say whether this feature is useful. I wish the Clover people would put out accessories as there is no end to what they can add. They could easily make swing out items such as a bottle opener, a carabiner type clamp to hang this from your belt loop, a flat LED flashlight to use at night. I could go on for hours. I haven't seen anything like that at their website yet. It will not replace your bloated wallet because it holds fewer items. This is for those who are sick of a fat wallet and are forcing themselves to go smaller to break that habit. It's very sturdy and VERY well made. The Clover company did not skimp anywhere. I dropped this on concrete and I can't find any spot where it dented. I do wish the edges were rounded off as you feel the corners if you have pants with very thin pocket liners. This is an uber-high quality item and when you hold it, you know it'll probably outlast you so you can hang on to it and give it to your kids when they grow up. I see myself hanging on to this for life!

product_title: Clover Men's Aluminum Wallet
review_body: This is a great wallet, it holds my keys very snug and all of the cards I need. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a nice wallet that also holds keys. It is a little large but thats because of the keys. It's a good trade off, the extra size to hold the keys.

product_title: Clover Men's Aluminum Wallet
review_headline: and the key mechanism is surprisingly easy to use in any kind of lock
review_body: This thing is dope. Holds just enough, doesn't feel bulky, and the key mechanism is surprisingly easy to use in any kind of lock. Plus I feel like a badass busting out a steel wallet.

product_title: Clover Men's Aluminum Wallet
review_headline: Apart from that info it's the best wallet I've owned
review_body: Ahh finally something to place my keys and cards into, This is a really really handy wallet! Now I won't forget my keys when I walk out. Haven't used it alot but it seems it will last quite a long time. As reviewers have mentioned it's not suppose to hold all your cash and cards as this is meant to be mininmalistic, but I have no trouble placing my extra cards in my uni bag but do keep this in mind. I'm holding 6 cards and it is already "full" in the sense that it will petrude out of the aluminum and won't be completely flat. Apart from that info it's the best wallet I've owned!

product_title: Clover Men's Aluminum Wallet
review_headline: It's a nice and solid design
review_body: It's a nice and solid design.  I used one of the include attachments to slip my bigger car key onto clover wallet.  Due to the total weight hanging off of my car key I think I need to add a magnet key chain to easily detach my car key from the wallet to not damage the ignition over time.  Otherwise its a nice concept and I look forward to using it.

product_title: Clover Men's Aluminum Wallet
review_headline: Really great product. Easy to assemble
review_body: Have been waiting for this wallet for a long time. Really great product. Easy to assemble, looks and feels secure, and it is small and lightweight at the same time. Happy with this purchase.

product_title: Clover Men's Aluminum Wallet
review_body: This is one NEAT minimal wallet. I am still adjusting but I cannot describe how much extra space I have in my pants pockets!!! Easy to assemble and even easier to maintain. I recommend this product.

product_title: Clover Men's Aluminum Wallet
review_body: Allows me to hold a lot more cash and cards than my previous leather wallet for half the width. I also enjoy the ability to hold several keys, so now I don't have to worry about my keys and wallet being in a separate place. What I enjoy the most about this wallet is that it is made of a sturdy aluminum. I would by another one for my friends and family.

product_title: Clover Men's Aluminum Wallet
review_body: If you don't have a thick car key, this wallet will garner a five star rating from you. Having such a key, I used the two-holed bicycle-chain-link-type spacer that comes in the little hardware packet. When installed like a key, but with the second hole outside the Clover's body, you can clip an external key ring to the wallet. I tried it: it was too bulky in my pocket, and the wallet hung off the car key in the ignition switch. I now carry my car keys and house key on a separate key ring like before, except the other keys are in the Clover. I keep an extra house key in the Clover too. One could carry a valet key for the car in case you lock your keys in the car.  So why didn't I give the Clover just four stars? After assembling and reassembling the wallet several times, I lost track of the bag of hardware. All it took was one email and a replacement came in the mail. Extra stars for extraordinary customer service.  The nylock (nylon lock) screws and wavy washers allow the tension to be adjusted "just so" for each key, so each key has exactly the same tension and feel when rotated in and out of the body. Clever Clover.

product_title: Clover Men's Aluminum Wallet
review_body: Best wallet ever! It's amazing that I can walk out of the house and not have to think about my keys!  The elastic band keeps all your cards right. Would recommend this piece of art to anyone!
